page.title: 17Butterfly Farm.
page.content: On April 1st 1985 Scotland's first {butterfly farm }opened.It is located at 313676 and is the latest edition to Dobbie's large garden centre.In the U.K.there are three other such farms. Already the project has been very successful.Coach parties of school children are a common sight.At weekends many day-trippers from Edinburgh pay a visit.It is a popular tourist attraction. Many colourful types of tropical butterflies fly freely round a large heated greenhouse. Visitors have to be sharp sighted to spot every species in the guide book. There is an exhibition room where display boards explain fascinating details of butterfly life.Other live insects such as tarantulas,bird spiders and locusts may be seen in glass cases.There is a gift shop.
